note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to Disappeared

This site is here to perserve infosec sites, tools and errata that is either already gone or endangered of disappearing from the interwebz. Help me save stuff by submitting sites via pull requests. I use
`
wget -mk http://www.site.com/
`
But if there is a better way please use it and let me know.
name: Disappeared
tagline: Repo of sites and tools that went %POOF%
